result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Clinton R. Southworth
Current: 1304 Depot Rd, Mosinee, WI 54455 United States  (Effective: 01-25-2017)
Prior: 718 Bertha Street, Wausau, WI 54403 United States
w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 10:37 am 
INCLUDES 15CF270, 15CF422, 15CF485, 15CF669, 15CF895, AND 15CM477. 
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo; Def appears in person, in custody with Atty Robin Kennedy and Atty Julie Sawyer. 

WAIVER OF PRELIMINARY HEARING IN 15CF270, 15CF422, 15CF485, and 15CF895,
Waivers of Prelim. filed. 
Court questions deft as to waivers. 
Court finds waivers freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  
Informations to be filed immediately after Court and will mirror criminal complaints. 

PLEA HEARING IN ALL FILES.   
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.

State moves to:
In 15CF270: Ct. 2 (Possess Drug Paraphernalia to Manufacture, Compound, Convert, Produce, or Store Methamphetamine/Repeater/PTAC)>>D&RI. 
In 15CF422: Ct. 1 (Possession of Methamphetamine/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
                    : Ct. 3 (Misd. BJ/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
In 15CF669: Ct. 1 (Possess with Intent -Amphetamine/Repeater/2nd and Subsequent Offense)>>DISMISS. 
                    : Ct. 2 (Felony BJ/Repeater)>>DISMISS. 
                    : Ct. 3 (Felony BJ/Repeater)>>DISMISS. 
                    : Ct. 4 (Felony BJ/Repeater)>>DISMISS. 
In 15CF895: Ct. 2 (Manufacture-Deliver Schedule I, II Narcotics/Repeater/2nd and Subsenquent Offense)>>D&RI. 
                    : Ct. 4 (Felony BJ/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
                    : Ct. 5 (Felony BJ/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
In 15CM477: Ct. 1 (OAR/Repeater)>>D&RI. 
COURT grants above. 

PLEA: 
In 15CF270: Ct. 1 (Possession of Methamphetamine/Repeater)>>GUILTY. 
In 15CF422: Ct. 2 (Felony BJ/Repeater)>>GUILTY. 
In 15CF485: Ct. 1 (Felony BJ/Repeater)>>GUILTY. 
In 15CF895: Ct. 1 (Manufacture-Deliver Amphetamine/Repeater/2nd and subsequent Offense)>>GUILTY. 
                    : Ct. 3 (Felony BJ/Repeater)>>GUILTY.  

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 
State makes statement. Atty Kennedy makes statement. 

COURT ORDERS: 
In 15CF270: Ct. 1>>4 years imprisonment - 2 years IC and 2 years ES. 
In 15CF422: Ct. 2>>6 years imprisonment - 3 years IC and 3 years ES - imposed and STAYED for 5 years probation. 
In 15CF485: Ct. 1>>6 years imprisonment - 3 years IC and 3 years ES - imposed and STAYED for 5 years probation.
In 15CF895: Ct. 1>>6 years imprisonment - 3 years IC and 3 years ES - imposed and STAYED for 5 years probation.
                    : Ct. 3 >>6 years imprisonment - 3 years IC and 3 years ES - imposed and STAYED for 5 years probation. 
COURT ORDERS as CONDITIONS of PROBATION/ES: assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by the dept; fulltime work/schooling of at least 30 hours per week or if not, perform 10 hours CS per week; AODA; absolute sobriety; No possession of alcohol or controlled substances except for prescriptions taken as prescribed and with agent authorization; DNA samples and surcharges; repayment of $200 buy money; CC. 
COURT ORDERS: probation to commence immediately and all sentences to run concurrent to each other. 
COURT finds the def is eligible for CIP and SAP on all files. 
COURT finds the def is entitled to 100 days sentence credit in each file. 
COURT remands def into custody for transport. 

Adj: 11:07 am

INCLUDES 15CF895,669,485,422,270, & 15CM477 Absolute sobriety. Contact Attic Correctional Services at 715-848-3202 for drugs-Day report. Shall not drive a motor vehicle without valid driver's license.    No controlled substances without valid prescription.   No contact with victim(s): B.W. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.
Pre-trial conference on June 30, 2015 at 10:00 am.
Pre-trial conference on May 18, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Clerk Marisa. 
Case Called: 1:57 pm 
INCLUDES 15CF270 AND 15CM477. 
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo; Deft appears in person with Atty Robin Kennedy. 
Date and time was set for preliminary hearing. 
State notes Atty Kennedy was recently appointed in these matters and requests matters be reset. 
COURT notes time limits were previously waived. 
COURT grants and advises parties to see JA to reset preliminary hearing. 
Adj: 1:58 pm

ADDRESS INFO for Clinton R. Southworth
Current: 718 Bertha Street, Wausau, WI 54403 United States  (Effective: 05-06-2015)
Prior: 1304 Depot Rd, Mosinee, WI 54455
Review hearing on May 6, 2015 at 01:40 pm.
Pre-trial conference on April 15, 2015 at 09:45 am.

Includes 15CM477 and 15CF270.    Shall not drive a motor vehicle without valid driver's license.  Absolute sobriety unless valid prescription for medications.    Contact Attic Correctional Services at 715-848-3202 on or before 4/15/15 with DAY REPORTING.  No controlled substances without valid prescription.
